mapper.select: SELECT r.ROLE_ID AS ROLE_ID, r.ROLE_NAME AS ROLE_NAME, r.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, u.USER_ID AS USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, IS_DISABLED, PARENT_ID, TRUE_NAME, MOBILE, EMAIL, SKIN, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_COUNT, u.CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME, u.CREATOR AS CREATOR, u.MODIFY_TIME AS MODIFY_TIME, u.MODIFIER AS MODIFIER FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id where u.user_id=#{userId}
